General.Name: Tier1 Technology S.A.
General.Description: TIER 1 Technology, S.A. develops and implements software solutions to companies, and public and private entities. The company offers ERP attractor software for business management; Comerzzia, an omnichannel sales platform for retailers; Engage software for the management and coordination of suppliers; Lustrum, a software application designed to support the comprehensive lifecycle management of business assets; SecureInvoice, an electronic invoicing solution; and Elevatorware, an elevator management system. It also provides IT infrastructure deployment and maintenance solutions; and business process outsourcing services. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Camas, Spain.
